sentences.sContent: Let’s have some plain, truthful answers.
sentences.sCn: 让我们听听坦率而真实的回答吧。

sentences.sContent: You don't need any special skills for this job, just plain common sense.
sentences.sCn: 这项工作不需要任何特殊技能，只要有普通常识就够了。

sentences.sContent: ...MPs voted overwhelmingly in favour of Labour amendments to the children and families bill last February that included the power to regulate for plain packaging...
...Evidence from Australia suggests plain packaging pushes society further along that road...

synos.tran: 平的；简单的；朴素的；清晰的
[地理]平原；无格式；朴实无华的东西

phrases.pCn: 纯文本；没有加密过的文件
简明英语；通俗易懂的话
[地]泛滥平原，冲积平原；河漫滩
冲积平原；冲积系；冲积平野
素混凝土；纯混凝土；无钢混凝土
用浅显的英语；说得明白点；坦白地说
滑动轴承；平面轴承；普通轴承；滑体轴承

words.tran: 明白地；坦率地；平坦地；朴素地

trans.tranOther: showing clearly and honestly what is true or what you think about something
